availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Kenas F. Prichard (Lawrence County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of James Prichard and Elizabeth Prichard. Married to Amelia C. Stewart Prichard in Lawrence County on August 27, 1859. Resident of Lawrence County in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Lawrence County in 1850. Attorney in Lawrence County in 1860. Attorney in Lawrence County in 1863. County attorney in Lawrence County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
